#pull size n, m times
percentile_bootstrap<-function(data,n,m){
  for (b in seq_len(m)){
    which.col<-sample(seq_len(n),n,replace=T)
    bootstrap.reps<-data[which.col,]
  }
  mean.HighBP<-rep(NA,m)#TODO: each factor
  for(i in 1:m){
    start_i<-n*(i-1)+1
    end_i<-n*i
    mean.HighBP<-mean(bootstrap.resp$HighBP[start_i:end_i])
    mean.HighChol<-mean(bootstrap.resp$HighChol[start_i:end_i])
    mean.BMI<-mean(bootstrap.resp$BMI[start_i:end_i])
    mean.AnyHealthcare<-mean(bootstrap.resp$AnyHealthcare[start_i:end_i])
    mean.GenHlth<-mean(bootstrap.resp$GenHlth[start_i:end_i])
    mean.Income<-mean(bootstrap.resp$Income[start_i:end_i])
  }
  
  return(bootstrap.reps)
}

diabetes.1<-percentile_bootstrap(diab.only.1,5,10)

for(i in 1:10){
  start_i = n*(i-1)+1
  end_i = n*i
  mean.diabetes.highBP[i]<-mean(diabetes.1$HighBP[1:nrow(diabetes.1)/2,])
}
mean.diabetes.highBP<-mean(diabetes.1$HighBP)
